successes.title: TAKTIK: Premium Protection System for the iPhone
successes.description: Uncompromising Rugged Cases LUNATIK for the iPhone 4s/5.

Pledges.description: Many Kickstarter backers say the journey is more important than the destination. Receive Backer Only updates that document the project.

Black TAKTIK iPhone 4/4S case (Retail $100)
* US Shipping included. Add $20 for international shipping.

White TAKTIK iPhone 4/4S case (Retail $100)
* US Shipping included. Add $20 for international shipping.
White TAKTIK iPhone 4/4S case + UPGRADED Gorilla Glass Lens (Retail $125) * US Shipping included. Add $20 for international shipping.
Black TAKTIK iPhone 4/4S case + UPGRADED Gorilla Glass Lens (Retail $125) * US Shipping included. Add $20 for international shipping.

Silver Anodized Aluminum TAKTIK iPhone 4/4S case + UPGRADED Gorilla Glass Lens (Retail $175) 
* US Shipping included. Add $20 for international shipping.
"Shadow Ops" Black Anodized Aluminum TAKTIK iPhone 4/4S case + UPGRADED Gorilla Glass Lens (Non-serialized) (Retail $175)* US Shipping included. Add $20 for international shipping.

TAKTIK iPhone 5 case (design, color, material and finish TBD) * US Shipping included. Add $20 for international shipping. **Est. delivery date for TAKTIK iPhone 5 case will be approx. 3 months after the iPhone 5 launch.

Mix 'n Match Pack includes: one set of Serialized Black Anodized Aluminum Bezels + UPGRADED Gorilla Glass Lens, one set of White Polymer Bezels + UPGRADED Gorilla Glass Lens, four Impact trusses in Black, LUNATIK Yellow, Hot Pink, and Glow in the Dark, four 3.5 Port covers in Black, Silver, Red and Orange Anodized Aluminum all for iPhone 4/4S case (Retail $350) 
* US Shipping included. Add $30 for international shipping.

Future Proof Pack includes: one TAKTIK iPhone 4/4S case (choose from  Black, White or Silver Anodized Aluminum) + UPGRADED Gorilla Glass Lens and the one future TAKTIK iPhone 5 case + UPGRADED Gorilla Glass Lens (choice of color and material TBD). (Retail $350) * US Shipping included. Add $30 for international shipping. **Est. delivery date for TAKTIK iPhone 5 case will be Dec. 2012 and will ship at no additional cost.
